column4: How do I change my GDM log-in screen?  I've installed a new theme from the repo's, but when I run gdmsetup (either from the command line or menu) I only get the chance to change default user - nothing about themes.
Since gdm has been restructured, I don't think there is a way to change themes through gdmsetup any longer
Because gdm is being restructured so with the current implementation, it is not possible
